# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(s; text_width = 10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + (isempty(current_line) ? 0 : 1) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            if !isempty(current_line)
                current_line *= " "
            end
            current_line *= word
        end
    end
    
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example = "This function will wrap words into lines"
println(wrap_string(example))
```
